title: Just downloaded replay file but it's corrupted
body:
I played a game yesterday and immedietly tried downloading the replay file. The file downloads but when I watch it I get an error. The error says that the replay file is corrupted.

I have tried deleting the file and redownloading it, but that does not fix the error. I also thought it may be too soon to download, so I tried again today and am seeing the same error.

How can I get this replay file? I had a pretty cool pentakill that I wanted to record in it.

replies.body: I attempted this connection guide for the same issue as the OP and got nothing. The file is still corrupted, however no other recent files are corrupt. Help?

> [{quoted}](name=x Big Papa x,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gxVABKbB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-24T22:01:09.760+0000)
>
> I attempted this connection guide for the same issue as the OP and got nothing. The file is still corrupted, however no other recent files are corrupt. Help?

Nope better make more skins. Have the same problem can't even find the file in League of Legends -> Replay folder. It wasn't even downloaded and it says it is corrupted.

Replay file corruption issues are typically caused by an unstable connection to our servers. You should be able to resolve this by configuring your network settings according to our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Please let me know if this fixed the issue for you.
